full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAS PA'I BSTAN BCOS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GYI LE'U BZHI PA'I MTHA' DPYOD MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO RJE RTA NAG PA DGE 'DUN BLO BZANG GI GSUNG RGYUN DRI MA MED PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @0183A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAM PA NYID KYI SLOB BU'I THA SHAL SH'AKYA'I BTZUN GZUGS 'JAM DBYANGS SPRUL MING 'DZIN PA DGE 'DUN BSAM 'GRUB RGYA MTSOS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
